name: Shadcn Localizations
description: Full localization delegate and base translations.

use: you need the base localization delegate for the library.
you want access to localized strings via `ShadcnLocalizations`.
avoid: you only need a single language (use `shadcn_localizations_en`).

examples.minimal:
MaterialApp(
  localizationsDelegates: ShadcnLocalizations.localizationsDelegates,
  supportedLocales: ShadcnLocalizations.supportedLocales,
  home: const MyApp(),
)

theming: Not applicable; this is a localization layer.
accessibility: Localization improves readability for users in their preferred language.
do: Add the delegate and supported locales to your app.
